org.mini2Dx.core.game

Class GameWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.game.GameWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AndroidGameWrapper, DesktopGameWrapper, HeadlessGameWrapper, IOSGameWrapper

    public abstract class GameWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements ApplicationListener
    An abstract implementation of Game for launching mini2Dx games
